mod.towers_of_the_wild_reworked.name: Towers of the Wild: Reworked
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.towers_of: Adds tall towers in your world, inspired by The Legend Of Zelda: Breath Of The Wild.
Find a Ancient Tower in the Woods or out: Find a Ancient Tower in the Woods or out in the Fields
Find a Tower in a Jungle: Find a Tower in the Jungle
Find a Tower in the Ocean: Find a Tower in the Ocean
Find a Tower in the Ocean...just with Co: Find a Tower in the Ocean...just with Corals
Fine...but how do I get up there?: Fine...but how do I get up there?
Are you able to climb all Towers?: Are you able to climb all Towers?
config.towers_of_the_wild_reworked.tower: The spacing between each tower (low: common, high: rare)
config.towers_of_the_wild_reworked.biome: A list of biomes where the towers will not spawn.
config.towers_of_the_wild_reworked.mod_i: If the Waytones mod is installed and this is set to true, towers will spawn with a waystone at the top. If the Waystone mod is not installed, this will have no effect.
